# Siktauryi Specialist
## Overview
You have undergone special trainings and bonded particularly well with [[Siktauryi|siktauryi]].

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *[[Hoyrall]]*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- Whenever you feed [[Siktauryi|siktauryi]] poison, it generates twice the amount of shots, up to its maximum capacity.
- Any [[Siktauryi|siktauryi]] you use doubles its maximum capacity to 24 doses of acid. Excess doses above its normal limit are lost if the [[Siktauryi|siktauryi]] leaves your possession.
- Choose one damage type from the following: Cold, fire, lightning, thunder. You can condition a [[Siktauryi|siktauryi]] via special pheromones to emit this type of energy instead of the default acid. You can change damage types upon making a short or long rest.
